column5: We just added an 800 movie library to our rental. 3/1/17. We now have Internet available for an additional fee. $12/night or $55/week. If interested let us know.   The Pelican's Nest is one of the newest rentals in Sargent, Tx and located just over an hour from Houston. Enjoy panoramic view of the Gulf while fish and crab from your private pier. Don't fight the crowds in Galveston. Come to Sargent.
